Obito sends the opponent into [[Kamui's Dimension|his pocket dimension]] and uses the block formations to crush them.

== Trivia ==
* Although the term {{translation|天地|tenchi}} commonly refers to the difference between heaven and earth, it can also be translated as "universe" or "cosmos", referring to Obito's pocket dimension.

[[es:Apertura y Cierre del Universo]]
